name: Bulbhead
description:
INFO

This was my first game made for a game jam and I learned a lot of things making it!

Every asset that was used to make this game (except the fonts) was made by me!

CONTROLS

Arrow keys to move around

Up arrow/space  to jump

You can jump higher by holding down the up arrow key

Z and C for light controls

Escape to pause/resume

IMPORTANT

Please don't rate the game if you haven't played half way through and haven't got the Light Bulb!
